title: Alien Eraser to the Rescue
description: Welcome to Max’s secret collection of inventions, comic strips, and random thoughts about school, family breakups, and the power of Alien Eraser. (Ages 8-12)Pimply older brothers. Good parents who get into bad fights. Lucky for Max, he has a place to jot down his mixed-up thoughts and brilliant ideas. In a quirky mix of comics, concoctions, and contraptions, Max tells thestory of his topsy-turvy life — and how he tries to hold it and himself all Together.
author: Marissa Moss
